ModMetaData.name: [XND] Turret Extensions
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description:
Current Version: v1.1.4 (28th August 2018)

A quality of life mod for turret users, and a resource which allows modders to create turret mods with more flair.

Documentation: https://github.com/XeoNovaDan/TurretExtensions/wiki
